title: Parasite Vocalizations
description: Parasite Vocalizations sound package with 172 high-quality monster sound effects, ready for use in game scenes, animations and trailers.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/parasite-vocalizations-preview

Full Audio Preview: https://youtu.be/mppwJ1E9XSQ

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/begw9ttgube4sh8/MSE%20-%20Parasite%20Vocalizations.pdf?dl=0


The Parasite monster is like a worm; there is something demonic, otherworldly, alien about it; it is vile, like a slug. All of its qualities formed the basis of the creature's creation and vocalization design.


The collection contains 12 voice actions, including 172 professionally designed vocalization one-shot sound effects, divided into:

  • 16 voice sounds during an attack
  • 12 battle shouts
  • 16 biting sounds
  • 8 deaths
  • 24 growls
  • 16 pains
  • 20 roars
  • 12 snarls
  • 12 victory shouts
  • 12 groans
  • 12 idle voice sounds
  • 12 grunting sounds


The voice samples are quite dry and ready for further processing. Such a variety of vocal samples can satisfy a wide variety of needs.Â 


This package is perfect for creating the voices of monsters: parasite, alien, demon, worm, slug and otherworldly vile creatures.


Using this asset, create an atmosphere for your project in the genre of fantasy, dark fantasy, horror or any other where monsters live and roar. Enjoy!


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 172 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 12 voice actions
  • 112 voice samples of the attacking type
  • 36 voice samples of the pain type
  • 24 neutral type voice samples
  • great for animations, trailers, game scenes for fantasy, dark fantasy, horror and more


Number of Audio Waves: 172

Number of Audio Cues: 172

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 3 minutes 28 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
